about_the_game:
Alpha Response thrusts players into the role of police officers from around the world. Your mission is to respond to crisis situations that require precise and lethal force in order to avoid civilian casualties. Players will have to work together and react to an extremely dynamic environment that includes a wide range of enemy combatants and innocent bystanders. Protect Society and bring order to a chaotic world!

As criminal and terrorist organizations have expanded their operations across borders, a multi-national initiative has formed that will allow police from various countries to work more closely. Players will choose to play as a variety of different police units from around the world to combat the criminal and terrorist organizations that wreak havoc on the city.

Alpha Response features a variety of dynamic non-linear missions that will challenge the player. Each mission can be approached from a variety of different ways and the enemies will appear in different locations each time the mission is played. Players must always be careful as each playthrough will be a different experience and they must adapt their tactics to the unique situation.

Missions will take place in various real world locations from around the world. Each level captures the distinct style of a particular region and will present the player with beautiful environments to explore and engage the enemy within.

A large variety of enemies will challenge the player and require different methods in order to defeat them efficiently. Enemies will include human combatants and vicious attack dogs, as well as robotic drones, and other vehicles.

The player will be forced to fight in a dynamic environment that includes elements such as innocent civilians which must be protected at all times and vehicles such as cars and helicopters which will be used to transport enemies into a mission zone or even attack the player.

The player can play as a variety of different police units from around the world and will have access to a large arsenal of weapons and upgrades

content_descriptors.notes:
Players will play as police and will be killing criminal gangsters and terrorists.

There will be civilians in the game but players are not encouraged to harm them. They must protect them and will be penalized in the game if they hurt any civilians

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10 / 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 (3.10GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.50GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10 / 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.20GHz) / AMD Ryzen 7 2700 (3.20GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 / AMD RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended

short_description: A fast paced tactical police shooter featuring dynamic missions that take place in real world locations that can be played in singleplayer mode or co-operatively.
